description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. A new additive called extract-11 has made food irresistible and mutated people into overweight raging hordes! All of the junk food across the nation is quickly consumed until only 4 pieces remain… Play as one of these 4 survivors armed with machine guns, flamethrowers, rocket launchers and more as they use overwhelming firepower to escape the grocery store in this epic twin stick shooter!
